description: High-level system architecture overview focusing on the RCS simulation and optimization system components, including core modules and their interactions
Detailed documentation of the Physical Optics (PO) RCS calculation algorithms, including mathematical models, surface normal handling, and radar scattering implementations
Comprehensive documentation of the genetic algorithm optimization system, including fitness functions, constraints handling, and evolutionary approaches for RCS minimization
Technical documentation of the stealth aircraft geometric modeling system, including shape generation, surface representation, and aerodynamic constraint implementations
Documentation of data flows between the RCS calculation, optimization, and geometric modeling components, including input/output specifications and component interactions
